content.raw:
That's a very good point.

> I can't think of when this might be an issue

I think compilation would fail if they're in the same lib

> it's really nice to be able to share serializers

Agreed. Maybe we could put the serializers which we expect to be shared in a common header? Or move them to a common header when the use case comes up? Downstream projects could also include our component's header to get the serializer...
